mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id memberId, p.product_id productId, ps.pending_sale_id pendingSaleId, vs.verified_sale_id verifiedSaleId, up.used_product_id usedProductId, vs.category_name verifiedCategory, vs.brand_name verifiedBrand, vs.product_name productName, ps.excepted_selling_price userPrice, vs.product_size verifiedSize, vs.verified_selling_price verifiedPrice, vs.used_or_not verifiedUsedOrNot, sg.grade_type gradeType, up.used_product_type usedProductType, ps.inspection_status inspectionStatus, vs.inspection_description inspectionDescription, ps.created_date createdDate, ps.product_description productDescription FROM member m INNER JOIN pending_sale ps ON ps.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN verified_sale vs ON ps.pending_sale_id = vs.pending_sale_id LEFT OUTER JOIN used_product up ON up.verified_sale_id = vs.verified_sale_id INNER JOIN sale_grade sg ON sg.sale_grade_id = vs.sale_grade_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.product_id = ps.product_id WHERE ps.inspection_status = 'ACCEPTED' AND vs.rejected_sale_id is null ORDER BY ps.created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
